function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI and big data for coronavirus testing and patient screening","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased results leading to misdiagnosis or mistreatment of patients","Mitigation":"Validation and verification of AI algorithms, regular updates based on new data and research","Technologies":"AI and machine learning algorithms, validation and verification tools","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Artificial intelligence and data science experts, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Remote diagnosis and monitoring of COVID-19 patients using voice analysis","Impact":"Misdiagnosis and inaccurate health status prediction leading to improper treatment","Mitigation":"Validation and accuracy testing of voice analysis technology, integration with traditional diagnostic methods","Technologies":"Voice analysis technology, validation and accuracy testing tools","People":"Healthcare workers, COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Voice analysis experts, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Deployment of predictive analytics for identifying severity of disease and patient triage","Impact":"Inaccurate severity assessment leading to improper patient management and allocation of resources","Mitigation":"Regular validation and updates of predictive models, integration with traditional clinical assessment methods","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, validation and updates tools","People":"Healthcare providers, COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Data scientists, healthcare institutions"}]}
